alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 26 at 3:47PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Guam and Rota. * WHEN...Through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Scattered showers and thunderstorms expected to become numerous to widespread by Wednesday night and continue into Friday. Heavy downpours expected, which could lead to flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
